type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Order of Heroes[/i] – Legendary creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Fólkvangr – [/i]{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Distribute X +1/+1 counters among up to X target creatures you control, where X is Alfonse, Prince of Askr's power. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
